this_title: Hello, Jack! The Kindness Show Season 1
introduction: Apple TV+ will expand its award-winning offering of premium Apple Originals for kids and families with “Hello, Jack! The Kindness Show,” a new, breakthrough live action series from creators Jack McBrayer (“30 Rock,” “Phineas and Ferb,” “Wreck-It Ralph” franchise) and Angela C. Santomero (“Blue’s Clues,” “Daniel Tiger’s Neighborhood”), author of Radical Kindness that aims to ignite kindness through exploring empathy, humor, playfulness and imagination.
chinese_title: Hello, Jack! The Kindness Show Season 1
